name: Blueberry Yum Yum
description: Blueberry Yum Yum is a hybrid strain whose popularity was ushered in by rap artist Ludacris and his song centered on the strain. While certainly the progeny of the famed Blueberry indica, its other parent is suspected to have been a Durban Poison sativa. Because of its parents’ polarity, Blueberry Yum Yum can express a wide spectrum of effects, but consumers typically report uplifting, happy effects perfect for any time of the day. Though dominated by an unmistakable blueberry aroma, accents of earthy mint and pine can also be detected on the palate.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Nausea, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
